name: Elly's Escape
description:
The slime Elly escapes from Dr. Ljiggy's lab into the sewer he considers his home.

This game was created by students whos going to become game developer in High School Novska, Croatia.

Controls

A, D or left and right arrow - move left-right

SPACE - jump

E - teleport

Credits

Game was created in Unity.

Team

Renato Pejčin

Dorian Jakovljević
